game_description: Burn Circles is a new vision of the old school Tetris game. Burn Circles is a puzzle game with a new creative idea. Burn Circles is interactive and immersive game. Be inside VR. Burn Circles is a good choice for those who love puzzles. Use Bomb & Line boosters! Burn as many blocks as you want! Enjoy colorful explosion effects! Unlock all 5 levels to gain more points! Try Burn Circles now!
review_1: At last i found tetris game that's compatible with VR. I really play inside circle tetris and burn blocks around me. It's the most interactive from such kind of games. I like it.
